ground_truth: The narrative begins with an unsuccessful attempt by the protagonist, followed by more failed efforts. As he attempts a few final desperate moves, they prove to be ineffective. The Man In Black is then smashed into a stone pillar and pinned there by the six-fingered sword. He switches hands, fully engaging in the battle, but is pushed back down the steps. Trying various styles, he is eventually controlled by the Man In Black, who then disarms him. Inigo retreats, jumping from the stairs to a moss-covered bar, swings out, lands, and retrieves his sword while the Man In Black watches him, then tosses his own sword to the landing. Mimicking Inigo, the Man In Black dives to the bar, performs a gymnastic maneuver with a high-scoring backflip, leaving Inigo staring in awe. He then dunks Inigo's head with the sword handle, rendering Inigo unconscious. The Man In Black retrieves his scabbard and pursues the Princess. Vizzini observes from a mountain path as the Man In Black runs below while FEZZIK stands with the Princess nearby. Time passes and Vizzini points them out. A nearby boulder is noted as Vizzini and Buttercup hurry away. FEZZIK grabs a rock and moves behind the boulder, as the Man In Black races up the mountain trail. He approaches a bend, slows, and listens. Hearing nothing, he continues, and a rock suddenly shatters on a boulder before him. Moving into the path, he picks up another rock but is signaled by the Man In Black to stop, who removes his sword and scabbard and approaches FEZZIK unarmed. He tosses away the rock, and although the Man In Black is sizable, he is dwarfed by FEZZIK. The Man In Black then launches an attack, delivering fierce blows, twisting FEZZIK’s arm, and executing wrestling moves, but FEZZIK is unaffected. Finally, the Man In Black steps back, gazing up at the Giant, and they prepare to begin their confrontation again.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: The tale commences with an unsuccessful endeavor by the hero, followed by additional futile attempts. As he makes a few ultimate frantic maneuvers, they turn out to be unproductive. The Gentleman In Ebony is subsequently smashed into a rock column and pinned there by the six-digit sword. He switches hands, fully engaging in the combat, but is pushed back down the stairs. Trying various techniques, he is eventually controlled by the Gentleman In Ebony, who then disarms him. Inigo withdraws, leaping from the stairs to a moss-covered beam, swings out, lands, and retrieves his sword while the Gentleman In Ebony observes him, then tosses his own sword to the landing. Imitating Inigo, the Gentleman In Ebony dives to the beam, performs a gymnastic maneuver with a high-scoring backflip, leaving Inigo staring in wonder. He then dunks Inigo's head with the sword grip, rendering Inigo unconscious. The Gentleman In Ebony retrieves his sheath and pursues the Princess. Vizzini observes from a mountain path as the Gentleman In Ebony runs below while FEZZIK stands with the Princess nearby. Time elapses and Vizzini points them out. A nearby boulder is noted as Vizzini and Buttercup hasten away. FEZZIK grabs a stone and moves behind the boulder, as the Gentleman In Ebony races up the mountain trail. He approaches a curve, slows, and listens. Hearing nothing, he continues, and a stone suddenly shatters on a boulder before him. Moving into the path, he picks up another stone but is signaled by the Gentleman In Ebony to halt, who removes his sword and sheath and approaches FEZZIK weaponless. He tosses away the stone, and although the Gentleman In Ebony is sizable, he is dwarfed by FEZZIK. The Gentleman In Ebony then commences an assault, delivering fierce strikes, twisting FEZZIK’s limb, and executing wrestling maneuvers, but FEZZIK is unaffected. Finally, the Gentleman In Ebony steps back, gazing up at the Giant, and they prepare to initiate their confrontation again.

test_cases.name: Active <-> Passive Transformation
test_cases.description: The narrative is begun by an unsuccessful attempt by the protagonist, followed by more failed efforts. As a few final desperate moves are attempted by him, they prove to be ineffective. The Man In Black smashes him into a stone pillar and pins him there with the six-fingered sword. Hands are switched by him, fully engaging in the battle, but he is pushed back down the steps. Trying various styles, he is eventually controlled by the Man In Black, who then disarms him. Inigo retreats, jumping from the stairs to a moss-covered bar, swinging out, landing, and retrieving his sword while he is watched by the Man In Black, who then tosses his own sword to the landing. Mimicking Inigo, the bar is dived to by the Man In Black, performing a gymnastic maneuver with a high-scoring backflip, leaving Inigo staring in awe. He then dunks Inigo's head with the sword handle, rendering Inigo unconscious. The scabbard is retrieved by the Man In Black, who pursues the Princess. Vizzini observes them from a mountain path as the Man In Black runs below while FEZZIK stands with the Princess nearby. Time passes, and they are pointed out by Vizzini. A nearby boulder is noted as Vizzini and Buttercup hurry away. A rock is grabbed by FEZZIK, who moves behind the boulder, as the Man In Black races up the mountain trail. A bend is approached by him; he slows and listens. Hearing nothing, he continues, and suddenly, a rock is shattered on a boulder before him. Moving into the path, another rock is picked up by him but is signaled by the Man In Black to stop, who removes his sword and scabbard and approaches FEZZIK unarmed. The rock is tossed away by him, and although the Man In Black is sizable, he is dwarfed by FEZZIK. An attack is then launched by the Man In Black, who delivers fierce blows, twists FEZZIK’s arm, and executes wrestling moves, but FEZZIK is unaffected. Finally, the Man In Black steps back, gazing up at the Giant, and their confrontation is prepared to begin again by them.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: The story starts with the protagonist's failed attempts, culminating in a final ineffective effort. The Man In Black smashes into a stone pillar, pinned by the six-fingered sword, switches hands, and battles fiercely but is pushed back. He is overpowered by the Man In Black, who disarms him. Inigo retreats, jumps to a mossy bar, swings, lands, and retrieves his sword. The Man In Black watches, then tosses his own sword, mimics Inigo, backflips, and leaves Inigo in awe. He knocks Inigo unconscious with the sword handle, retrieves his scabbard, and pursues the Princess. Vizzini observes as the Man In Black runs below while FEZZIK stands with the Princess. Vizzini points them out and hurries away with Buttercup. FEZZIK grabs a rock, hides, and the Man In Black approaches. Hearing nothing, he moves on, and a rock shatters before him. He picks up another rock but is signaled by the Man In Black, who approaches unarmed. FEZZIK tosses the rock, and although the Man In Black is large, he is dwarfed by FEZZIK. The Man In Black attacks with fierce blows and wrestling moves, but FEZZIK remains unaffected. Finally, the Man In Black steps back, looking up at the Giant, ready to confront him again.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: The story begins with the protagonist failing repeatedly. In final desperate moves, he is ineffective, and the Man In Black is pinned to a stone pillar by the six-fingered sword. Switching hands, he engages in battle but is pushed down the steps. Trying different styles, he is overpowered by the Man In Black, who disarms him. Inigo retreats, jumping to a moss-covered bar and retrieves his sword, while the Man In Black watches and mimics him. He performs a gymnastic backflip, leaving Inigo awestruck, then knocks him unconscious with the sword handle. The Man In Black retrieves his scabbard and chases the Princess. Vizzini watches from a mountain path as the Man In Black runs below, while FEZZIK stands with the Princess. Time passes, and Vizzini notes their location. As they hurry away, FEZZIK grabs a rock and hides behind a boulder. The Man In Black advances up the trail, slowing to listen. Suddenly, a rock shatters before him. He picks up another rock, but the Man In Black signals him to stop and approaches unarmed. FEZZIK, much larger, discards the rock. The Man In Black attacks with fierce blows and wrestling moves, but FEZZIK is unaffected. Finally, the Man In Black steps back, and they prepare to confront each other again.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: The narrative unfolds with the initial unsuccessful attempt made by the determined protagonist, which is soon followed by a series of additional failed efforts, painting a picture of ongoing struggle. As desperation sets in, he makes a few last-ditch efforts, each move more frantic than the last, but unfortunately, they all turn out to be just as ineffective. The Man In Black is then forcefully smashed into a solid stone pillar and becomes pinned to it by the formidable six-fingered sword. In a move of strategic resourcefulness, he switches hands, fully engaging himself in the intense battle, though he finds himself gradually being pushed back down the steps. As he experiments with various fighting styles, attempting to gain the upper hand, he is eventually overpowered by the Man In Black, who skillfully disarms him. Inigo, realizing the dire situation, retreats in a swift manner, leaping from the stairs to a bar covered in thick, green moss. With a bold swing, he lands gracefully, retrieves his sword, and regains composure while the Man In Black observes intently. The Man In Black then tosses his own sword onto the landing, mirroring Inigo’s movements. In an impressive display, he mimics Inigo by diving onto the bar, executing a gymnastic maneuver with a seamless, high-scoring backflip, leaving Inigo wide-eyed and staring in awe at the expert movements. Subsequently, he uses the handle of his sword to dunk Inigo’s head, knocking him unconscious. The Man In Black efficiently retrieves his scabbard and quickly pursues the Princess. Meanwhile, Vizzini observes the scene from a mountain path as the Man In Black dashes below, with FEZZIK standing steadfastly with the Princess nearby. Moments pass, and Vizzini points them out to FEZZIK. A nearby boulder is noticed as Vizzini and Buttercup hurriedly make their way in the opposite direction. FEZZIK, picking up a sizable rock, moves stealthily behind the boulder, while the Man In Black races up the winding mountain trail. As he reaches a bend, he instinctively slows down, listening intently. Hearing no sound, he continues onward until suddenly, a rock shatters dramatically on a boulder in front of him. Moving cautiously into the path, he picks up yet another rock but is signaled to halt by the Man In Black, who removes his sword and scabbard, choosing to approach FEZZIK unarmed, signaling his intentions. He then discards the rock, and although the Man In Black himself is of considerable size, he is utterly dwarfed by the imposing figure of FEZZIK. Without hesitation, the Man In Black launches into an attack, delivering a series of fierce, powerful blows, twisting FEZZIK’s arm, and employing various wrestling techniques, but FEZZIK remains unaffected, standing his ground. Finally, the Man In Black steps back, taking a moment to gaze up at the towering Giant, as both prepare to resume their confrontation with renewed determination.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: The gripping narrative begins with the resolute protagonist making an initially unsuccessful attempt, determined yet thwarted in his efforts. This first failure is promptly followed by a string of additional unsuccessful endeavors, painting a vivid picture of ongoing struggle and persistent effort. As the situation becomes increasingly dire, a sense of desperation sets in for him, prompting a few frantic, last-ditch attempts, each more hurried and frantic than the preceding one. Unfortunately, these efforts all prove to be equally ineffective, leading to mounting frustration. The Man In Black is then violently thrust against a hard, unyielding stone pillar, where he becomes pinned in place by the imposing six-fingered sword. In a display of strategic resourcefulness, he switches hands, fully immersing himself in the heated battle, only to find himself steadily forced backward down the steep steps. As he experiments with various fighting styles, seeking to gain any kind of advantage, he is ultimately subdued by the Man In Black, who expertly disarms him with great skill. Realizing the precariousness of the situation, Inigo makes a hasty retreat, rapidly leaping from the stairs to a bar covered in thick, slippery green moss. With a daring swing, he lands with grace and agility, swiftly retrieves his sword, and regains his composure, all while the Man In Black watches him intently, analyzing every move. The Man In Black then flings his own sword onto the landing, replicating Inigo’s actions. In a remarkable and impressive display, he mimics Inigo by diving onto the bar, executing a seamless, gymnastic maneuver of a high-scoring backflip, leaving Inigo wide-eyed, staring in awe at the expert athleticism on display. Subsequently, he uses the handle of his sword to dunk Inigo’s head, delivering a blow that renders him unconscious. The Man In Black efficiently retrieves his scabbard and quickly sets off in pursuit of the Princess. Meanwhile, Vizzini observes the unfolding scene from a vantage point along a mountain path as the Man In Black dashes purposefully below, with FEZZIK standing steadfastly, the Princess near at hand. Moments tick by, and Vizzini points them out to FEZZIK. A nearby boulder catches his attention as Vizzini and Buttercup hurriedly make their way in the opposite direction. FEZZIK, picking up a sizable rock, stealthily moves behind the boulder, while the Man In Black races up the winding, serpentine mountain trail. As he approaches a bend, he instinctively slows his pace, listening intently for any sound. Hearing nothing, he continues onward until, without warning, a rock shatters dramatically on a nearby boulder right in front of him. Cautiously moving into the path, he picks up another rock but is signaled to halt by the Man In Black, who deliberately removes his sword and scabbard, choosing to approach FEZZIK unarmed, clearly signaling his peaceful intentions. He then discards the rock, and although the Man In Black himself is of considerable size, he is completely dwarfed by the imposing, giant figure of FEZZIK. Without hesitation, the Man In Black launches into an attack, delivering a series of fierce, powerful blows, twisting FEZZIK’s arm, and employing a variety of wrestling techniques. Despite this, FEZZIK remains unaffected, standing firm and resolute. Finally, the Man In Black steps back, taking a moment to gaze up at the towering Giant, as both prepare to resume their intense confrontation with renewed determination and vigor.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: The narrative begins with the protagonist making an unsuccessful attempt, which unfolds as he tries to execute a move, only to find it ineffective. Despite several more tries, each one fails, leaving him in a state of defeat. As he attempts a few final, desperate moves, these too prove useless, leading to his inevitable failure. Following this, the Man In Black forcefully propels the protagonist into a stone pillar, forcefully pinning him against it with the imposing six-fingered sword. In response, the protagonist switches the sword to his other hand, a tactical move to fully engage in the battle, but as the fight progresses, he is gradually pushed back down the steps, struggling to maintain his footing. He tries various fighting styles, adapting and adjusting his technique, but ultimately finds himself under the control of the Man In Black, who skillfully maneuvers to disarm him. Realizing he is at a disadvantage, Inigo retreats strategically, making a calculated jump from the stairs to grab onto a moss-covered bar. He then swings out with agility, lands deftly, and quickly retrieves his sword. The Man In Black watches this sequence of events closely, assessing his opponent's moves, before nonchalantly tossing his own sword to the landing. Observing Inigo's tactics, the Man In Black mirrors his actions, diving toward the bar and executing an impressive gymnastic maneuver, culminating in a high-scoring backflip that leaves Inigo momentarily stunned, staring in awe. Capitalizing on this moment of distraction, he uses the sword handle to dunk Inigo's head, rendering him unconscious. Seizing the opportunity, the Man In Black retrieves his scabbard and turns his focus to pursuing the Princess. Meanwhile, Vizzini stands on a mountain path, observing the Man In Black as he runs below, with FEZZIK and the Princess standing nearby. As time passes, Vizzini identifies them in the distance, and they take note of a nearby boulder. Reacting quickly, Vizzini and Buttercup hurry away, leaving FEZZIK to grab a rock and strategically position himself behind the boulder, preparing for the Man In Black's approach. As the Man In Black races up the mountain trail, he nears a bend, instinctively slows his pace, and attentively listens for any sounds. Hearing nothing, he confidently continues on the path, when unexpectedly a rock shatters against a boulder in front of him. Undeterred, he steps into the path, bending down to pick up another rock, but is signaled by the Man In Black, who gestures for him to stop. The Man In Black then deliberately removes his sword and scabbard, signaling his intention to approach FEZZIK unarmed. Recognizing the gesture, FEZZIK tosses the rock aside, acknowledging the Man In Black's bravery, and though The Man In Black is sizable, FEZZIK towers over him, presenting an imposing figure. Undaunted, the Man In Black launches an attack, directing fierce blows towards FEZZIK, attempting to twist his arm and execute wrestling moves, yet FEZZIK remains unaffected, standing his ground. Finally, the Man In Black steps back, taking a moment to gaze up at the Giant, reassessing the situation as they prepare to restart their confrontation.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: The narrative unfolds with the protagonist making a series of unsuccessful attempts, culminating in his being smashed into a stone pillar and pinned by the six-fingered sword. Switching hands to fully engage in the battle, he is forced back down the steps. Despite trying various styles, he is eventually overpowered and disarmed by the Man In Black. Inigo retreats, grabs his sword after a daring jump and swing from a moss-covered bar, while the Man In Black mimics his move with a high-scoring gymnastic backflip, leaving Inigo in awe. The Man In Black swiftly renders Inigo unconscious with a strike from the sword handle, retrieves his scabbard, and departs in pursuit of the Princess. Meanwhile, Vizzini observes from a mountain path as the Man In Black approaches below, with Fezzik and the Princess nearby. As Vizzini and Buttercup hurry away, Fezzik takes cover with a rock behind a boulder. The Man In Black, ascending the mountain trail, pauses to listen before continuing, only for a rock to shatter on a nearby boulder. Signaled to stop by the Man In Black, who approaches unarmed, Fezzik discards the rock. Despite the Man In Black's size, he is dwarfed by Fezzik. An intense confrontation ensues, with the Man In Black executing fierce blows and wrestling moves, although Fezzik remains unaffected. Ultimately, the Man In Black steps back, ready to renew the confrontation with the Giant.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: The narrative begins with an unsuccessful attempt by the protagonist, a skilled swordsman from a distant land renowned for its fencing masters, followed by more failed efforts. As he attempts a few final desperate moves, inspired by techniques from legendary duels, they prove to be ineffective. The Man In Black, a mysterious figure whose identity is shrouded in secrecy, is then smashed into a stone pillar that has stood for centuries as part of an ancient castle's defenses, and pinned there by the six-fingered sword, a weapon forged by an infamous blacksmith and known for its unique balance and sharpness. He switches hands, fully engaging in the battle with ambidextrous skill, but is pushed back down the steps of the grand staircase. Trying various styles, including those developed by the greatest fencing schools of Europe, he is eventually controlled by the Man In Black, who then disarms him. Inigo retreats, jumping from the stairs to a moss-covered bar, once part of a collapsed archway, swings out, lands, and retrieves his sword while the Man In Black watches him, then tosses his own sword to the landing, demonstrating his mastery and composure. Mimicking Inigo, the Man In Black dives to the bar, performs a gymnastic maneuver with a high-scoring backflip, learned from circus acrobats, leaving Inigo staring in awe. He then dunks Inigo's head with the sword handle, an unexpected move, rendering Inigo unconscious. The Man In Black retrieves his scabbard and pursues the Princess, who is betrothed to a tyrannical prince from a neighboring kingdom. Vizzini, a cunning strategist known for his intellect, observes from a mountain path as the Man In Black runs below while FEZZIK, a giant with unmatched strength and a gentle heart, stands with the Princess nearby. Time passes and Vizzini, who prides himself on his cunning plans, points them out. A nearby boulder, massive and immovable by ordinary means, is noted as Vizzini and Buttercup hurry away. FEZZIK grabs a rock, hefting it effortlessly due to his immense strength, and moves behind the boulder, as the Man In Black races up the mountain trail that leads to the perilous cliffs. He approaches a bend, slows, and listens carefully for any sounds of danger. Hearing nothing, he continues, and a rock suddenly shatters on a boulder before him, startling him with its force. Moving into the path, he picks up another rock but is signaled by the Man In Black to stop, who removes his sword and scabbard, showing his intent to face FEZZIK unarmed. He tosses away the rock, and although the Man In Black is sizable, standing taller than most, he is dwarfed by FEZZIK's colossal size. The Man In Black then launches an attack, delivering fierce blows, twisting FEZZIK’s arm with leverage techniques, and executing wrestling moves taught by masters of combat, but FEZZIK is unaffected, his sheer bulk and strength absorbing the impact. Finally, the Man In Black steps back, gazing up at the Giant, and they prepare to begin their confrontation again, each assessing the other's capabilities.

test_cases.name: Addition (~50%)
test_cases.description: The narrative begins with an unsuccessful attempt by the protagonist followed by more failed efforts. As he attempts a few final desperate moves they prove to be ineffective. The Man In Black is then smashed into a stone pillar and pinned there by the sixfingered sword. He switches hands fully engaging in the battle but is pushed back down the steps. Trying various styles he is eventually controlled by the Man In Black who then disarms him. Inigo retreats jumping from the stairs to a mosscovered bar swings out lands and retrieves his sword while the Man In Black watches him then tosses his own sword to the landing. Mimicking Inigo the Man In Black dives to the bar performs a gymnastic maneuver with a highscoring backflip leaving Inigo staring in awe. He then dunks Inigo's head with the sword handle rendering Inigo unconscious. The Man In Black retrieves his scabbard and pursues the Princess. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. Vizzini observes from a mountain path as the Man In Black runs below while FEZZIK stands with the Princess nearby. Time passes and Vizzini points them out. A nearby boulder is noted as Vizzini and Buttercup hurry away. FEZZIK grabs a rock and moves behind the boulder as the Man In Black races up the mountain trail. He approaches a bend slows and listens. Hearing nothing he continues and a rock suddenly shatters on a boulder before him. Moving into the path he picks up another rock but is signaled by the Man In Black to stop who removes his sword and scabbard and approaches FEZZIK unarmed. He tosses away the rock and although the Man In Black is sizable he is dwarfed by FEZZIK. The Man In Black then launches an attack delivering fierce blows twisting FEZZIK’s arm and executing wrestling moves but FEZZIK is unaffected. Finally the Man In Black steps back gazing up at the Giant and they prepare to begin their confrontation again.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: The tale starts with a fruitless quest by the birdwatcher, followed by more bungled endeavors. As she performs a couple of ultimate daring tricks, they prove to be futile. The Artist In Gray is then catapulted into a wooden fence and secured there by the eight-legged table. She changes feet, fully committing to the duel, but is shoved back down the ladder. Trying different dances, she is ultimately managed by the Artist In Gray, who then unarms her. Evelyn retreats, leaping from the ladder to a dust-covered anvil, swings out, lands, and reclaims her shield while the Artist In Gray observes her, then lobs her own shield to the platform. Imitating Evelyn, the Artist In Gray dives to the anvil, executes a circus trick with a high-flying cartwheel, leaving Evelyn gazing in wonder. She then splashes Evelyn's face with the shield handle, rendering Evelyn asleep. The Artist In Gray reclaims her backpack and chases the Duchess. George observes from a riverbank as the Artist In Gray sprints below while HECTOR stands with the Duchess close by. Time moves and George gestures toward them. A nearby tree stump is spotted as George and Butterbean scurry away. HECTOR snatches a branch and shifts behind the tree stump, as the Artist In Gray dashes up the hill path. She approaches a curve, slows, and listens. Hearing emptiness, she proceeds, and a branch suddenly splinters on a tree stump ahead of her. Stepping into the track, she picks up another branch but is signaled by the Artist In Gray to pause, who removes her shield and backpack and approaches HECTOR unshielded. She hurls away the branch, and although the Artist In Gray is robust, she is overshadowed by HECTOR. The Artist In Gray then initiates a strike, delivering fiery taps, twisting HECTOR's leg, and performing acrobatic stunts, but HECTOR remains unmoved. Finally, the Artist In Gray steps aside, staring up at the Colossus, and they prepare to resume their skirmish once more.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: The narrative opens with the protagonist repeatedly failing in his attempts. The Man In Black is eventually pinned by the six-fingered sword, forcing him to switch hands and engage more fully in the battle. Despite his efforts, he is disarmed and Inigo briefly gains control, but the Man In Black soon disarms him again. Inigo retreats and retrieves his sword while the Man In Black performs a gymnastic maneuver, leaving Inigo astonished before knocking him unconscious. The Man In Black then pursues the Princess. Vizzini observes from a mountain path, while FEZZIK stands with the Princess. As the Man In Black approaches, FEZZIK attacks with a rock but misses. The Man In Black signals for peace, disposes of his weapon and confronts FEZZIK unarmed. Although dwarfed by the Giant, he launches a series of fierce attacks. Even after executing wrestling moves, FEZZIK remains unaffected. They prepare to restart the confrontation.

test_cases.name: Reverse Segments Order
test_cases.description: Finally the Man In Black steps back gazing up at the Giant and they prepare to begin their confrontation again The Man In Black then launches an attack delivering fierce blows twisting FEZZIK’s arm and executing wrestling moves but FEZZIK is unaffected He tosses away the rock and although the Man In Black is sizable he is dwarfed by FEZZIK Moving into the path he picks up another rock but is signaled by the Man In Black to stop who removes his sword and scabbard and approaches FEZZIK unarmed Hearing nothing he continues and a rock suddenly shatters on a boulder before him He approaches a bend slows and listens FEZZIK grabs a rock and moves behind the boulder as the Man In Black races up the mountain trail A nearby boulder is noted as Vizzini and Buttercup hurry away Time passes and Vizzini points them out Vizzini observes from a mountain path as the Man In Black runs below while FEZZIK stands with the Princess nearby The Man In Black retrieves his scabbard and pursues the Princess He then dunks Inigo's head with the sword handle rendering Inigo unconscious Mimicking Inigo the Man In Black dives to the bar performs a gymnastic maneuver with a highscoring backflip leaving Inigo staring in awe Inigo retreats jumping from the stairs to a mosscovered bar swings out lands and retrieves his sword while the Man In Black watches him then tosses his own sword to the landing Trying various styles he is eventually controlled by the Man In Black who then disarms him He switches hands fully engaging in the battle but is pushed back down the steps The Man In Black is then smashed into a stone pillar and pinned there by the sixfingered sword As he attempts a few final desperate moves they prove to be ineffective The narrative begins with an unsuccessful attempt by the protagonist followed by more failed efforts
